abstract: BrightSource Energy, a start-up formed to build solar thermal power plants, canceled its initial public offering on Wednesday, just hours before trading was to begin. The company's I.P.O. troubles are emblematic of the dark clouds that have settled over the solar market, writes Diane Cardwell in The New York Times.
